page.title: 16HOUSING IN EXMOUTH
page.content: There are several different types of houses in{EXMOUTH.}In the town the houses are mainly terraced, which means they are joined on both sides, forming a row.Further out of the town are some newer housing estates,with some terraces and some semi-detached houses. In the more rural areas the houses tend to be much bigger, detached and have very big gardens. Price Range Here are some examples of the prices Two-bedroomed houses are about Â£25000 Three_bedroom houses are about Â£32000 Town houses are about Â£28000 or Â£28500 The very big houses are Â£52000-Â£62000 The flats in{EXMOUTH}can be rented for Â£30 a week. They are used by {holiday makers.}
